name: Tomato Basil Pasta
instructions: Boil pasta until al dente. In a pan, saut√© garlic in olive oil, add chopped tomatoes, cook for 5 minutes. Toss in cooked pasta and chopped basil. Season with salt and pepper. Serve warm.

name: Simple Omelette
instructions: Whisk eggs with milk, salt, and pepper. Melt butter in a pan over medium heat, pour in egg mixture, cook until set. Fold and serve.

name: Avocado Toast
instructions: Toast the bread. Mash avocado with lemon juice, salt, and pepper. Spread avocado mix on toast. Enjoy.
